channel.title: Venture Kick on Nimverta
channel.description: Recent content in Venture Kick on Nimverta

item.title: Nimverta Secures Venture Kick Support to Advance Bone Regeneration Therapy
item.description: Nimverta, a Zurich-based biotech startup, has secured CHF 10,000 in funding from Venture Kick, entering a new phase in its journey to develop first-in-class peptide therapies for bone regeneration.
